# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# OSOOL RAILWAY PRODUCTION ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# Copy these to Railway Dashboard → Variables Tab
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# CORE SETTINGS
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
ENVIRONMENT=production
PORT=8000
PYTHONPATH=/app

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# DATABASE (Auto-generated by Railway)
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
DATABASE_URL=${{Postgres.DATABASE_URL}}

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# AI CONFIGURATION (CRITICAL FOR AMR AGENT)
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Get from: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-proj-PASTE_YOUR_KEY_HERE

# Get from: https://console.anthropic.com/settings/keys
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=sk-ant-api03-PASTE_YOUR_KEY_HERE

# Claude Model Configuration
CLAUDE_MODEL=claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022
CLAUDE_MAX_TOKENS=4096
CLAUDE_TEMPERATURE=0.3

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# VECTOR STORE (Supabase)
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Get from: Supabase Project Settings → API
SUPABASE_URL=https://YOUR_PROJECT_ID.supabase.co
SUPABASE_KEY=YOUR_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY_HERE

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# SECURITY KEYS (GENERATE NEW VALUES!)
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32
JWT_SECRET_KEY=PASTE_GENERATED_KEY_HERE

# Generate with: python -c "from cryptography.fernet import Fernet; print(Fernet.generate_key().decode())"
WALLET_ENCRYPTION_KEY=PASTE_GENERATED_KEY_HERE

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# ADMIN API KEY (CRITICAL - Required by main.py:243)
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Generate with: python backend/generate_secrets.py
# This key is REQUIRED for the backend to start in production mode
ADMIN_API_KEY=PASTE_GENERATED_KEY_HERE

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# REDIS (Optional - Auto-linked from Railway Redis service)
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# If you added Redis service in Railway, uncomment and use:
REDIS_URL=${{Redis.REDIS_URL}}
# If Redis not added, leave empty (optional for Phase 1)

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# PGVECTOR COMPATIBILITY
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Railway PostgreSQL doesn't include pgvector extension by default
# Set to 1 to use text-based fallback (still fully functional)
SKIP_PGVECTOR=1

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# CORS (Update after Vercel deployment)
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Start with localhost, then update to Vercel URL
FRONTEND_DOMAIN=http://localhost:3000

# After Vercel deployment, update to:
# FRONTEND_DOMAIN=https://your-project.vercel.app

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# OPTIONAL: MONITORING & ERROR TRACKING
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Get from: https://sentry.io (if you have an account)
SENTRY_DSN=

# Logging
LOG_LEVEL=info

# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# OPTIONAL: BLOCKCHAIN (For future phases)
# ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# For Phase 1, blockchain is optional
# BLOCKCHAIN_SIMULATION_MODE=true
# POLYGON_RPC_URL=https://polygon-amoy.g.alchemy.com/v2/YOUR_KEY
# OSOOL_REGISTRY_ADDRESS=0x...

# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# DEPLOYMENT STEPS:
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# 1. Generate security keys: python backend/generate_secrets.py
#    This generates: JWT_SECRET_KEY, ADMIN_API_KEY, WALLET_ENCRYPTION_KEY
# 2. Get API keys from OpenAI and Anthropic
# 3. (Optional) Set up Supabase project for vector store, or use Railway PostgreSQL
# 4. Copy all variables to Railway Dashboard → Variables Tab
# 5. Ensure SKIP_PGVECTOR=1 is set if not using pgvector extension
# 6. Deploy and monitor logs for "[+] Osool Backend is ONLINE"
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
